# 原创
：  共模攻击题目

# 共模攻击题目

### [BJDCTF2020]rsa_output

[题目地址](https://buuoj.cn/challenges#%5BBJDCTF2020%5Drsa_output)

```
{,2767}

{,3659}

message1= 

message2= 

```

我们可以发现n都是一样的，e和c不一样，共模攻击脚本跑一下：

```
import sys
import binascii
import gmpy2
sys.setrecursionlimit(1000000)
def egcd(a, b):
    if a == 0:
      return (b, 0, 1)
    else:
      g, y, x = egcd(b % a, a)
      return (g, x - (b // a) * y, y)
def modinv(a, m):
    g, x, y = egcd(a, m)
    if g != 1:
      raise Exception('modular inverse does not exist')
    else:
      return x % m



e1=2767

e2=3659

s = egcd(e1, e2)
s1 = s[1]
s2 = s[2]

if s1&lt;0:
   s1 = - s1
   c1 = modinv(c1, n)
elif s2&lt;0:
   s2 = - s2
   c2 = modinv(c2, n)
m=(pow(c1,s1,n)*pow(c2,s2,n)) % n
print(m)
print (binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))

```

最后的flag：`BJD{r3a_C0mmoN_moD@_4ttack}`

### SameMod

[题目地址](https://buuoj.cn/challenges#SameMod)

```
{6266565720726907265997241358331585417095726146341989755538017122981360742813498401533594757088796536341941659691259323065631249,773}
{6266565720726907265997241358331585417095726146341989755538017122981360742813498401533594757088796536341941659691259323065631249,839}

message1=3453520592723443935451151545245025864232388871721682326408915024349804062041976702364728660682912396903968193981131553111537349
message2=5672818026816293344070119332536629619457163570036305296869053532293105379690793386019065754465292867769521736414170803238309535

```

做这题的时候一开始想到是将明文进行hex的，试了一下发现不对，才通过ascii的方式解得，flag需要是可见字符，所以不存在1开头的十位数，所以1开头的肯定是100以上的三位数，由此可解得flag<br/> 解题脚本：

```
import sys
import binascii
import gmpy2
sys.setrecursionlimit(1000000)
def egcd(a, b):
    if a == 0:
      return (b, 0, 1)
    else:
      g, y, x = egcd(b % a, a)
      return (g, x - (b // a) * y, y)
def modinv(a, m):
    g, x, y = egcd(a, m)
    if g != 1:
      raise Exception('modular inverse does not exist')
    else:
      return x % m

c1=3453520592723443935451151545245025864232388871721682326408915024349804062041976702364728660682912396903968193981131553111537349
n=6266565720726907265997241358331585417095726146341989755538017122981360742813498401533594757088796536341941659691259323065631249
e1=773
c2=5672818026816293344070119332536629619457163570036305296869053532293105379690793386019065754465292867769521736414170803238309535
e2=839

s = egcd(e1, e2)
s1 = s[1]
s2 = s[2]

if s1&lt;0:
   s1 = - s1
   c1 = modinv(c1, n)
elif s2&lt;0:
   s2 = - s2
   c2 = modinv(c2, n)
m=(pow(c1,s1,n)*pow(c2,s2,n)) % n
print(m)
# print (binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))
# m=1021089710312311910410111011910111610410511010710511610511511211111511510598108101125
result = str(m)
flag=""
i=0
while i &lt; len(result):
    if result[i]=='1':
        c=chr(int(result[i:i+3]))
        i+=3
    else:
        c=chr(int(result[i:i+2]))
        i+=2
    flag+=c
print(flag)

```

最后的flag：`flag{whenwethinkitispossible}`
